text.textblock: Farm Credit Administration Board; Special Meeting

summary.textblock: Notice is hereby given, pursuant to the Government in the Sunshine Act (5 U.S.C. 552b(e)(3)), of the special meeting of the Farm Credit Administration Board (Board).

date.textblock: The special meeting of the Board will be held at the offices of the Farm Credit Administration in McLean, Virginia, on February 17, 1994, from 10:00 a.m. until such time as the Board concludes its business.

further.textblock: Secretary to the Farm Credit Administration Board,

address.textblock: Farm Credit Administration, 1501 Farm Credit Drive, McLean, Virginia 22102-5090.

supplem.textblock: Parts of this meeting of the Board will be open to the public (limited space available), and parts of this meeting will be closed to the public. The matters to be considered at the meeting are:
a. Proposed Policy Statement on Regulatory Philosophy.
b. Proposed Policy Statement for Comment Concerning System Institution Activities Involving the Potential for Non-Exclusive Territories.
a. Referral of Crimes and Suspected Crimes (Final).
b. Conflict of Interest Rules for Farmer Mac (Final).
